cyclone.name: HERMINE
cyclone.current_location: about 170 miles WSW of Key West, Florida
cyclone.trajectory: Forecast to turn WNW, then NW and north, reaching the Florida Big Bend and then moving NE across Georgia and the U.S. southeast coast
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: Florida Big Bend coast (near Cedar Key, FL)

weather_observation.impacted_coast: Florida Keys and Big Bend, then Georgia and Carolinas coasts
weather_observation.wind: Breezy conditions possible; sustained winds expected to remain below tropical‐storm force (≤34 kt)
weather_observation.rainfall: Occasional outer-band showers; totals generally under 2 inches
